last_episode_to_air.name: Digging for Gold
last_episode_to_air.overview: Dan Snow follows in the footsteps of the prospectors of the 19th-century Klondike gold rush. The team finally set about the back-breaking work of mining for gold.

name: Operation Gold Rush with Dan Snow
original_name: Operation Gold Rush with Dan Snow
overview: Dan Snow leads a team of adventurers on an epic journey across the Canadian wilderness, following in the footsteps of the 19th-century Klondike gold rush. Their mission? To find their own gold.

episodes.name: Mountain Passes
episodes.overview: Dan Snow leads a team of adventurers on an epic journey across the Canadian wilderness. In this episode, Dan and his team take on the Alaskan Coastal Mountains.

episodes.name: Lakes and Rivers
episodes.overview: On this leg of the epic journey following in the footsteps of 19th-century Klondike gold rush prospectors, Dan and his team attempt to traverse perilous waterways.

episodes.name: Digging for Gold
episodes.overview: Dan Snow follows in the footsteps of the prospectors of the 19th-century Klondike gold rush. The team finally set about the back-breaking work of mining for gold.
